collaboration.title: How We Work
collaboration.intro:
Everyone has different goals, pace, and levels of experience.
UnAI is not a linear course, but a flexible support system.
You can stay at one level or continue further - whenever it makes sense for you.
collaboration.intro_call_text:
A short 15-minute call to understand your goals and assess how AI can help you.
No obligation to continue.
collaboration.mentoring_text:
Personalized support tailored to your needs.
You can stay at this level as long as you wish - the focus is on practical application, tools, and tangible results.
collaboration.group_text: Thematic workshops and group sessions (e.g. prompt engineering), designed for those who want peer learning and hands-on experience with others.
collaboration.masterclass_text:
Advanced topics such as automation, AI processes, and tools like n8n.
For those who want deeper understanding with more technical detail.

instructor.name: Miodrag Strak
instructor.title: AI Mentor
instructor.bio:
With over 25 years of experience working with public and private universities, international projects, the financial sector, and companies, I bring together education and real-world practice.
Through long-term mentoring of young people and professionals, my focus is on understanding, practical application, and independent use of artificial intelligence. Alongside education, I am actively involved in the design and implementation of AI systems - from automations and AI agents to production-ready solutions in real business environments.
My approach combines academic knowledge, mentoring experience, and hands-on work.
